_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Flamecord
author: admin@softwarenoob.com
description: FlameCord is a patch for Travertine to fix possible exploits and add useful functionalities. FlameCord aims to fix Netty related exploits to keep your server safe from attacks.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# FlameCord Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y curl git 

mkdir -p /mnt/server/tmp
cd /mnt/server/tmp

rm /mnt/server/${SERVER_JARFILE}
# set some needed variables
git config --global user.email "you@example.com"
git config --global user.name "Your Name"

# Clone the repo 
echo "git clone https://github.com/2lstudios-mc/FlameCord.git"
git clone https://github.com/2lstudios-mc/FlameCord.git 
cd FlameCord/
chmod +x scripts/build.sh

#build the jar
echo "start building"
./scripts/build.sh --jar

# Find the jar file and move it
JAR_PATH=$(find . -name FlameCord.jar)
mv ${JAR_PATH} /mnt/server/${SERVER_JARFILE}
rm -rf /mnt/server/tmp

echo "Install complete"

variables.name: FlameCord Jar File
variables.description: The name of the jar file to use when running FlameCord.
